text:
Pacsa
Pacsa
is a town in
Zala County
.
Understand
Pacsa was first mentioned in 1256 .
It was elevated to town status in 2009 .
This article includes travel-related information not only for Pacsa , but also for the surrounding rural areas .
By train
The closest railway station is Zalaszentmihály-Pacsa , where you can transfer to regional buses towards Pacsa .
There are no direct trains from
Budapest
-Déli pályaudvar , you have to transfer in Zalaszentiván .
The whole journey from Budapest to Pacsa takes 5 hours and costs 4805 Ft.
Zalaszentmihály-Pacsa Train Station
, Vasútállomás utca , Zalaszentmihály , ☏ +361 349-4949 , ✉ informacio@mav-start.hu .
There is no ticket office , tickets can be purchased on the train .
By bus
Direct buses from
Budapest
-Déli pályaudvar are available once a day , which are operated by
G-Busline Kft
.
The journey takes 2½ hours and costs 4015 Ft. More frequent buses are available from
Zalaegerszeg
.
The journey takes about 45 minutes and costs 560 Ft.
Get around
There is no local public transport or taxi service .
You can use the regional buses operated by
ÉNYKK
.
See
In Pacsa :
John the Baptist Roman Catholic Church
( Keresztelő Szent János római katolikus templom ) , Deák Ferenc utca 3 .
Saint Mark Roman Catholic Chapel
( Szent Márk római katolikus kápolna ) , Szőlőhegy , Pacsa .
Built in 1763 in Baroque style .
In Búcsúszentlászló :
Calvary Chapel
( Kálvária-kápolna ) , Búcsúszentlászló .
Built in the second half of the 18th century in Baroque style .
Surrounded by the stations of the Holy Cross road .
Roman Catholic Church
( Római katolikus templom ) , Arany János utca , Búcsúszentlászló .
Built in 1734 in Baroque style .
It 's a place of pilgrimage .
In Egervár :
Castle of Egervár
( Egervári várkastély ) , Vár út 15 , Egervár , ☏ +3620 324-2257 , ✉ reneszanszvarkastely@gmail.com .
Apr 7 – Oct 28 : Tu – F 10:00 – 18:00 , Sa 10:00 – 16:00 , Su 12:00 – 18:00 .
Built around 1560 in Renaissance style .
It is now used as hotel .
Adult 1000 Ft ; senior , student 600 Ft.
Saint Catherine Franciscan Church
( Szent Katalin ferences templom ) , József Attila utca 1 , Egervár .
Built in 1511 in Gothic style .
In Ligetfalva :
Kacika Petting Zoo
( Kacika állatsimogató ) , Ligetfalva , ☏ +3620 489-7200 , ✉ eklerhegyszarvas@gmail.com .
Su 14:00 – 17:00 .
In Nagykapornak :
Holy Saviour Roman Catholic Church
( Szentséges Üdvözítő római katolikus templom ) , Zrínyi utca , Nagykapornak .
Built in 1779 in Baroque style .
In Söjtör :
Birthplace of Ferenc Deák ( Museum )
( Deák Ferenc szülőháza ( múzeum ) ) , Deák Ferenc utca 154 , Söjtör , ☏ +3692 369-039 .
M – F 09:00 – 17:00 .
Built around 1860 in Baroque style .
Ferenc Deák was born in this house .
There is an exhibition about traditional gentry lifestyle .
Festetics Mansion
( Festetics-kastély ) , Deák Ferenc utca 140 , Söjtör .
Built around 1820 in Classicist style .
It is used as an elementary school .
Saint James Apostle Roman Catholic Church
( Szent Jakab apostol római katolikus templom ) , Petőfi utca , Söjtör .
Built in 1779 in Baroque style .
In Zalaszentmihály :
Saint Michael the Archangel Roman Catholic Church
( Szent Mihály arkangyal római katolikus templom ) , Rákóczi út , Zalaszentmihály .
Built in the 15th century in Gothic style .
Do
Fishing Lake of Zalaszentmihály
( Zalaszentmihályi Horgásztó ) , Zalaszentmihály , ☏ +3630 939-8612 , ✉ info@zszhe.hu .
Artificial lake with fishing possibilities .
Horse Farm of Gyűrűs
( Gyűrűsi ménes ) , Petőfi Sándor utca 2 , Gyűrűs , ☏ +3670 591-8762 , ✉ kovacsemese1993@gmail.com .
Lunge , riding training , trail riding .
Riding training : 3000 Ft.
Szépmező Horse Yard
( Szépmező Lovasudvar ) , József Attila utca 73 , Egervár , ☏ +3630 313-8134 , ✉ info@szepmezo.com . 08:00 – 20:00 .
Lunge , riding training , trail riding , carriage tour .
Riding training : 3500 Ft , carriage tour : 5000 Ft.

M – F 06:00 – 18:00 , Sa 06:00 – 14:00 .

M – Sa 10:00 – 20:30 , Su 10:00 – 15:00 .

Traditional restaurant and pizzeria .
1600
Ft , pizza : 1090 Ft.
Korzó Restaurant

Traditional restaurant and pizzeria with local cuisine .
1690 Ft , pizza : 1390
Ft , hamburger : 690 Ft.
Rózsakert Restaurant and Cafe

Traditional restaurant and pizzeria with local cuisine and with specialties like deer stew with porcini and dödölle .
1590 Ft , pizza : 1250 Ft.
Rózsakő Csárda
, Rákóczi Ferenc utca 7 , Zalaszentmihály , ☏ +3630 820-4829 , ✉ francsics.tomi@freemail.hu .
Tu – Sa 12:00 – 22:00 .
Traditional restaurant .
Vöröskő Restaurant and Pizzeria
, Deák Ferenc utca 183 , Söjtör , ☏ +3620 433-0464 .
M – Th Su 11:30 – 22:00 , F – Sa 11:30 – 22:30 .
Traditional restaurant and pizzeria with specialties like lepény and prósza . 1890 Ft , pizza : 1490 Ft , hamburger : 690 Ft.
Drink

Kedvenc Presszó

Sleep
There are no accommodations in Pacsa .

Aba Guesthouse
